extendedInfo.description: A simple companion to help keep track of your score while watching the TV show Jeopardy! I designed it for my wife and I as we like to compete while watching.Tested on: G1/MT3G/N1/Galaxy SPlease email me with any issues you might have1.1 Update: Fixed FCs from Correct/Wrong buttons

reviews.comment: Very simple and fun to use when watching Jeopardy. I love this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect, but...
reviews.comment: Would be absolutely perfect if you could keep score for two players. Other than that it is exactly what you need. Nice work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Genius!
reviews.comment: I\'m practicing for auditions for the show. Here I was with pen & paper, but now I can concentrate on answers! If I get on & win, I\'ll send dev. $100!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs one more thing.
reviews.comment: This app is great.  However, it needs one more addition.  It would be complete if it could keep track of total number of answers correct and total number wrong, not just dollar value. For example, 5 correct and 2 wrong.  I just like to see how many answers I get right or wrong.  Thanks, keep up the good work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Double/Final wager doesnt work
reviews.comment: The wagering part doesn\'t work for me, otherwise ok. I\'d like to see right/wrong stats too. Samsung Intercept....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works great for keeping track of your score. Might finally have the confidence to take the test!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works well on my DROID X. Does make looking at Jeopardy more entertaining. (Turns out I\'m not as good as I thought I was)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it, keeps score, only wish you could use more than one person
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app! I would stats options if the developers are feeling ambitious...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I always wanted something like this, easy to use and easy to keep your own score, right at your fingertips. A must for at home jeopardy players!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it, just wish it had a multi player option
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally
reviews.comment: This will solve so many fights.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love it\'s, allows me to keep track. Great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really simple and easy to use. Works great on my HTC Incredible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This is a great app for all Jeopardy players. Keeps \'em focused! Keep up the Good Work!
reviews.author: Andy Leal

reviews.comment: Dumb

reviews.comment: Okay program. Great idea.

reviews.comment: What a great idea!

reviews.comment: Way cool app for Jeopardy fans! I had one force-close unfortunately... (N1 - beta 2.2)
